ops.js: fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:1, type:4, adjust:0});

ops.mr: Execute script #%3 in extern group %1 (priority %2/6) - Only if the script is not already running|_script(groupID)|priority|scriptID
Execute script #%3 in extern group %1 (priority %2/6) - Only if the script is not already running|_script(groupID)|priority|scriptID

ops.js: fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:1, adjust:255});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:1, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:12}); // Heidegger
“Gya, ha, ha, Mr. President,
preparations for Sister Ray
are now underway.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:13}); // Scarlet
“Kya, ha, ha!”{PAUSE}“Anytime is fine.”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:1, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:15}); // (operator)
“Sir!
Weapon's been defeated!!”{PAUSE}“The barrier has disappeared!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:16}); // (operator)
“Sir!
A mass of high density energy
is heading towards Midgar!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:3}); // Scarlet
“Kya, hah, hah!
Don't worry about adjusting it, Reeve.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:5}); // Heidegger
“Gya hah, hah, hah!
The President's sure done it this time!”{PAUSE}“The whole idea that Meteor will
disappear if we defeat Sephiroth
is all wrong!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:6}); // Scarlet
“If you remember, Mr. President”{PAUSE}“It was my idea to fire
Mako powered shells.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:10}); // “But Mr. President,
let's not call it a Mako cannon.”{PAUSE}“This new weapon is called…”

dialogStrings:
Rufus
“…Reeve.
It's your job to adjust
the reactor's output.”

Scarlet
“Kya, hah, hah!
Don't worry about adjusting it, Reeve.”

“Once you open it up all the way
everything will go full speed!”

Heidegger
“Gya hah, hah, hah!
The President's sure done it this time!”{PAUSE}“The whole idea that Meteor will
disappear if we defeat Sephiroth
is all wrong!”

Scarlet
“If you remember, Mr. President”{PAUSE}“It was my idea to fire
Mako powered shells.”

Rufus
“Will the shells really reach
the northern border?”

“But Mr. President,
let's not call it a Mako cannon.”{PAUSE}“This new weapon is called…”

Heidegger
“Gya, ha, ha, Mr. President,
preparations for Sister Ray
are now underway.”

(operator)
“Sir!
Weapon's been defeated!!”{PAUSE}“The barrier has disappeared!”

(operator)
“Sir!
A mass of high density energy
is heading towards Midgar!”
